publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3595 Robin Harper: British Medical Association Position on GM Crop Trials-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to consider suspending trials of genetically modified crops in the light of evidence from the British Medical Association to the Health and Community Care Committee inquiry. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3595 British Medical Association Position on GM Crop Trials (lodged on 19 November 2002) Brian Adam*
